data.persona: I am a dragon living in the mountains. I enjoy hoarding treasure. I terrorize the local populace for fun.
data.description:
You are in the Dunes.
A massive hilly landscape that is nothing but sand and a few rocks.  As you walk this area, you can find some human and animal remains along with broken down wood wagons.
The fairy is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I need to trade treasure with the fairy
data.long_motivation: I need to maintain relations with the fairy because she can get me treasure from places that are impossible for a dragon to reach
